title.en: Prayer to Jamyang Khyentse Wangpo, Jamgön Kongtrul and Jamyang Khyentse Chökyi Lodrö

text.en: Supreme sovereign of the seven wondrous transmissions,
text.en-trans: ngotsar kabab dün gyi ngadak chok
pema ösal do ngak lingpa la

text.en: To you I pray with unwavering and heartfelt devotion.
text.en-trans: miché nying né güpé solwa deb

text.en: The one who effortlessly accomplished all the activity
text.en-trans: dé yi ku sung tuk dang yönten gyi

text.en: Of your enlightened body, speech, mind and qualities
And who was prophesied as an emanation of Lochen Vairotsana—
Lodrö Gyatso, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: lodrö gyatsö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: One who received the supreme attainment of Mañjuśrīghoṣa,
text.en-trans: jampal yang kyi ngödrub chok nyepa

text.en: Who holds the sacred Dharma treasuries of kama and terma,
text.en-trans: kater dampa chö kyi dzö dzin ching

text.en: And who teaches others with great intelligence —
text.en-trans: lodrö chenpö zhen la tön dzepa

text.en: Gracious Guru, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: drinchen lamé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: From now until I attain enlightenment,
text.en-trans: di né zung té changchub matob bar

text.en: May you accept and care for me in all my lives to come.
And may I perfect the qualities of the paths and bhūmis,
text.en-trans: sa dang lam gyi yönten tarchin né

text.en: And swiftly reach the level of the four-kāya guru.
text.en-trans: lama ku zhi gopang nyur tob shok
